data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=wIJxBBQlaw4Q7kNvgFhOryB&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBxY69VxmiUxre5MEz8sQWV0WVNtuWuXG-eQf8OMMwUHw&oe=6683E51C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=QlscW86ulwUQ7kNvgHcZ4YO&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCWtKuzTGB7tGBkPMOOQ2TB6S8cQu23_Fj3Dq7h-fGxMQ&oe=6683EEA4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=731I1BH_ai0Q7kNvgGgIPHj&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDRmTnGMIgxWsN1Gti81Ke53uQ6OJGXbnScIHCWChqdog&oe=6683D607)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=qqkcgHQG5tIQ7kNvgH3q_ea&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB9xPnqvgLCbmj2ptEIKzDXVdfnx7j4arqNSHSl4vGBZw&oe=6683C8E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=0akXNAie3rYQ7kNvgFCNCNs&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBkNiPztWmKwRGAesBWoyN5JAOqbJoWJ9xXaBHSxGsBhA&oe=6683F558)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=xEky255FvioQ7kNvgHsC_au&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCKUuwCxA6H96Vv_TgBPhv3VN2BD2I1RJXRVI-z5bG7Ag&oe=6683F1D9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=nTylAPgVXKcQ7kNvgHdvIPz&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBgXF5EHkjtUYV6wKCgMTTuHiwLDkD5VOSim7CvYgnr9g&oe=6683D7F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=chnQln1A2-EQ7kNvgEDGuGh&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBo6o-8gUGnuvPDj4gB3jiwqn4VTsu599amVAjQ6lJoiQ&oe=6683C26A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=HM58TrnvNE4Q7kNvgHnlS_W&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBxHOHFsj6u9Q-HvDvZBklu_3aEvHv1qFfKuMjQdB52jg&oe=6683D617)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=QzufVacTKmQQ7kNvgGwcgmO&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDrkajwsEGt-tKhaAC9EMseXh-gmDcPN12KcC3sDm1dvw&oe=6683F18C)
